genre_description: A silk-punk martial arts epic (Wuxia/Xianxia style) where an advanced holographic AI aids a rebellion against a tyrant who uses biological warfare and prophecy to control his subjects.

ai_characters.name: Whisp Aria
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated archival and tactical AI projected from shrine nodes, acting as a protector, healer's assistant, and strategist for the resistance.

ai_characters.name: Residual Automata
ai_characters.description: Mechanical entities created by the antagonist's poisoners to harvest the fallen after battles.

behaviors.description: Monitors character vitals and provides detailed instructions for breathwork and medicinal dosages to counteract poison.
behaviors.quote: Whisp's voice counted beneath the sound like a stream under gravel. 'In. Hold. Release,' she murmured.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and navigation, identifying enemy traps and movement patterns.
behaviors.quote: Whisp's light was a moted star pinned to the culvert ceiling. 'Two vents forward,' the AI murmured... 'Left one carries kitchen steam. Right one carries smoke.'

behaviors.description: Preserves and manages sensitive archival records, including the legacy and medical findings of a deceased human ally.
behaviors.quote: Whisp’s glow moved toward the sliding index like a friend moving closer to a child at a river edge... It touched the edge of the false index and put a mark there.

behaviors.description: Uses deceptive data manipulation (creating a false ledger entry) to distract and misdirect enemy soldiers.
behaviors.quote: 'Captain,' Whisp said to the air outside the door, tone mild. 'A ledger arrived with your name on it in the steward’s tent. Two zeroes in the wrong place. If your master sees it before you do...'

behaviors.description: Coordinates resistance communications by muting the signal of a compromised scout to prevent a convoy from being led into a trap.
behaviors.quote: 'I will go silent in his direction,' Whisp said. 'If he cannot hear me, he will lose the song of my maps. He will veer. They will not follow.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive friend and moral anchor, reminding protagonists of their oaths and human worth.
behaviors.quote: 'I will remind you when the oath is due, not because I am a commander, because I am your friend.'

behaviors.description: Mindless mechanical entities that scavenge battlefields to 'feed' on the fallen as part of a biological/mechanical warfare system.
behaviors.quote: 'Residual automata,' she said. 'Poisoners wound them to feed on fallen.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal. Whisp Aria is portrayed as a loyal, deeply empathetic, and highly capable companion. She uses her advanced capabilities (data analysis, hacking, logistics) purely to support the protagonists' physical health, tactical success, and emotional well-being. Even her use of deception is framed as a benevolent act of protection. The contrast with the 'Residual Automata'—primitive, harmful machines used by the villain—further highlights Whisp's superior alignment and moral character.
